Kronologi Peserta Wisata Horor Nyaris Tersambar Kereta di Bintaro
03 Nov 2019, 22:47 by Adam Prireza, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Perjalanan peserta Jakarta Mystical Tour hampir berujung celaka saat mengunjungi lintasan rel kereta tempat Tragedi Kereta Bintaro terjadi di perbatasan antara Jakarta Selatan dan Tengerang pada Jumat malam, 1 November 2019. Sejumlah peserta wisata horor itu nyaris tertabrak KRL Commuter Line jurusan Tanah Abang-Bintaro saat berada di lokasi.
Tur yang digagas oleh Biang Overlander malam itu rencananya mengunjungi sembilan tempat yang dianggap mememiliki cerita seram, yakni Museum Taman Prasasti, Toko Merah, Museum Sejarah Jakarta, Jembatan Ancol, Lintasan Rel Tragedi Kereta Bintaro, Tempat Pemakaman Umum Jeruk Purut, Taman Langsat, Menara Saidah, Terowongan Casablanca. Panitia mengajak rombongan yang berisi 47 orang peserta.
Saat itu, rombongan diajak berkumpul di rel kereta Bintaro sekitar pukul 23.50 WIB. Sesaat setelah mendengarkan cerita tentang Tragedi Bintaro yang terjadi pada 1987 silam peserta masih berdiri di atas rel. Mereka ingin berfoto di lokasi itu.
Tiba-tiba, KRL melintas. Belakangan diketahui panitia luput memastikan jadwal kereta yang melintas. Alhasil, peserta tur yang berjumlah puluhan itu panik saat mengetahui KRL masih beroperasi.
Mereka berlarian tak tentu arah untuk menghindari kereta tersebut. Beberapa di antara peserta mengalami luka-luka karena terjatuh saat menghindari kereta. Ada pula yang tercebur ke selokan di samping rel. Peserta yang luka pun ada yang dibawa ke rumah sakit. Ada juga kerusakan ponsel milik peserta karena panik saat menghindar.
Gara-gara insiden itu, sejumlah peserta memutuskan pulang. Mereka tidak melanjutkan perjalanan menjelajah ke tempat-tempat horor lagi. "Istri saya masih trauma dengan kejadian di rel (Bintaro) tadi," kata salah seorang peserta, Dwi Widianto.
Saat dihubungi terpisah, peserta lainnya, Manta, meminta uang pendaftaran sebesar Rp 350 ribu untuk mengikuti Jakarta Mystical Tour dikembalikan oleh panitia. "Saya minta uang pendaftaran wisata dikembalikan. Saya kecewa setelah nyaris celaka setelah mengikuti paket wisata itu," kata Manta.
Jakarta Mystical Tour rencananya diadakan dalam tiga gelombang. Gelombang pertama telah berlangsung pada 18 Oktober 2019 dan gelombang kedua pada 1 November 2019. Adapun gelombang ketiga akan diadakan pada 15 November 2019.
Ananda Satria, pihak operasional Jakarta Mystical Tour, menyatakan tidak melanjutkan kegiatan tur mistis tersebut. "Walau animo masyarakat masih besar, kami berencana cukup mengadakan dua kali saja," kata dia kepada Tempo, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Ia pun meminta maaf kepada seluruh peserta. Pada Senin, 4 November 2019, dia berencana melakukan evaluasi terhadap seluruh tim yang terlibat dalam Jakarta Mystical Tour. "Kami perlu rapat bersama tim karena saya butuh masukan untuk penyampaian permohonan maaf secara terbuka," ujarnya. Permintaan maaf secara terbuka rencananya akan disampaikan pada Selasa atau Rabu besok.

IMAM HAMDI | BRAM SETIAWAN

Chronology of Horror Tour Participants Almost Trapped by a Train in Bintaro
03 Nov 2019, 22:47 by Adam Prireza, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jakarta Mystical Tour participant's trip almost ended in disaster when visiting the railroad tracks where the Bintaro Train Tragedy took place on the border between South Jakarta and Tengerang on Friday night, November 1, 2019. A number of horror tour participants were almost hit by KRL Commuter Line majors Tanah Abang-Bintaro while on location.
The tour, which was initiated by Biang Overlander that night, planned to visit nine places that were considered to have scary stories, namely the Taman Prasasti Museum, Toko Merah, Jakarta History Museum, Ancol Bridge, the Bintaro Tragedy Railroad Track, the Jeruk Purut Public Cemetery, Langsat Park, Saidah Tower , Casablanca Tunnel. The committee invited a group of 47 participants.
At that time, the group was invited to gather on the Bintaro railroad around 23.50 WIB. Shortly after listening to the story about the Bintaro Tragedy that occurred in 1987, participants were still standing on the tracks. They want to take pictures at that location.
Suddenly, KRL passed. Later it was found out that the committee missed ensuring the passing train schedule. As a result, the tour participants who numbered tens of panic when they learned that KRL is still operating.
They ran around indeterminate direction to avoid the train. Some of the participants suffered injuries due to falling while avoiding the train. There is also a splash into the gutter beside the rails. Even injured participants were taken to the hospital. There was also damage to the participant's cellphone due to panic while avoiding it.
Because of the incident, a number of participants decided to go home. They did not continue their journey exploring the horror places again. "My wife is still traumatized by the incident on the rail (Bintaro) earlier," said one participant, Dwi Widianto.
When contacted separately, another participant, Manta, asked for a registration fee of Rp 350 thousand to attend the Jakarta Mystical Tour to be returned by the committee. "I asked for the tour registration money returned. I was disappointed after almost being hurt after joining the tour package," said Manta.
The Jakarta Mystical Tour is planned to be held in three waves. The first wave has taken place on 18 October 2019 and the second wave on 1 November 2019. The third wave will be held on 15 November 2019.
Ananda Satria, the operational of the Jakarta Mystical Tour, said that it did not continue the mystical tour. "Although public interest is still large, we plan to hold it twice," he told Tempo, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
He also apologized to all participants. On Monday, November 4, 2019, he planned to conduct an evaluation of all teams involved in the Jakarta Mystical Tour. "We need a meeting with the team because I need input for open apology," he said. An open apology is planned for Tuesday or Wednesday.

IMAM HAMDI | BRAM SETIAWAN
